deal.finePrint: Limit 1 per person. Must provide name and shipping address at checkout, which will be provided along with your Groupon login email to The Slanket to facilitate shipping. Valid only for option purchased. Online only. Any return must occur within 14 days of receiving goods. Ships within the contiguous U.S. only. Extra $5 fee for shipping. Does not ship to PO boxes. Ships out in 7-10 business days from purchase date. Goods sold by Groupon Goods.
deal.pitchHtml:
What You Get

  • For $14, you get an Original Slanket (a $29.99 value). Choose from the following colors:
    • Limoges blue
    • Moss green
    • Chocolate
    • Alaskan blue
    • Princess armour pink
    • Magenta
    • Turquoise
    • First light yellow
  • An additional $5 shipping fee will be charged at checkout for each option.

Orders fulfilled by Slanket. Visit the Groupon Goods FAQ for more info.

Overview

Featured on media powerhouses such as Today and 30 Rock and embraced by celebrities such as Samuel L. Jackson, the Original Slanket keeps wearers warm and dexterous with 100% polyester microfiber fleece. Each super-soft swaddler features two giant, loose-fitting sleeves that leave arms able to pick up books, remote controls, and the drooping chins of Slanket-less friends. Designed for frequent use, the Original Slanket returns to factory-born brilliance after a spin in any standard washing machine.

Features

  • 60"x95" fleece blanket with sleeves
  • 100% polyester microfibers
  • Non-pilling, machine-washable material
  • Functional design endorsed by leisurely wizards
  • Click here for additional information

How to Get Your Goods

Step 1.
Purchase your Groupon using the buy button on this page.

Step 2.
No need to do anything else! By purchasing this Groupon and providing your name and shipping address, you've completed the order for your Original Slanket and it should ship within 7-10 business days.

Step 3.
Enjoy!
deal.highlightsHtml: Flowing fleece blanket with loose-fitting sleeves lets wearers maintain full use of their hands while lounging
deal.title: $14 for an Original Slanket ($29.99 Value). Eight Colors Available.

says.emailContent: Are all curses actually just remedies for hubris?
says.websiteContentHtml:
Whether you're feeling so low that you're down in the dumps or feeling so sensational that you're up in the dumps, you'll feel better after repeating a motivational mantra to yourself. Seek success with these proven maxims:

• "Go for the gold!"
• "Live your best life!"
• "Is that gold from earlier making, like, a 'whirring' noise?"
• "Be the change you want to see!"
• "Dang! That gold is hot to the touch … just like I should be."
• "Everyone who looks at the gold starts bleeding. We have to get rid of it."
• "The pawn-shop owner's dog hissed at the gold and when the owner screamed at us, I noticed his mouth had 100 teeth in it."
• "I told the police, 'The gold burned down my house! It was the gold!' but they wouldn't listen!"
• "Is this what you wanted, gold? To see me reduced to nothing?"
• "I buried the gold in cement at a construction zone, but didn't notice the sign reading 'Future Site of The Center for Hubris Studies.'"
• "Settle for silver."
says.emailContentHtml: Are all curses actually just remedies for hubris?
says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Motivational Mottos

• "Settle for silver."
